研究表明胎盘 B 族链球菌与新生儿入院率较高有关胎盘中无乳链球菌（B 族链球菌；GBS）脱氧核糖核酸 (DNA) 的临床意义。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231204/Study-Links-Placental-Group-B-Streptococcus-to-Higher-Neonatal-Unit-Admissions-in-Newborns.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231204/Study-Links-Placental-Group-B-Streptococcus-to-Higher-Neonatal-Unit-Admissions-in-Newborns.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5696307f-ec73-4f93-9ebf-277ee133cca2 Mon, 04 Dec 2023 09:33:00 -0500 Study links placental Group B Streptococcus to higher neonatal unit admissions in newborns

研究揭示孕产妇糖尿病如何在单细胞水平影响出生缺陷母亲糖尿病导致胎儿先天性异常的机制。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231204/Study-reveals-how-maternal-diabetes-affects-birth-defects-at-the-single-cell-level.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231204/Study-reveals-how-maternal-diabetes-affects-birth-defects-at-the-single-cell-level.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=fb80c60a-0f9d-4cfa-b13c-f7fe33106e6a Mon, 04 Dec 2023 08:24:00 -0500 Study reveals how maternal diabetes affects birth defects at the single-cell level
父母与婴儿直接进行皮肤接触是否可以改善 4 个月大早产儿的互动？分娩时初次皮肤接触（SSC）对母婴互动质量的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231204/Does-immediate-parent-infant-skin-to-skin-contact-improve-interaction-in-very-preterm-babies-at-4-months。 ASPX https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231204/Does-immediate-parent-infant-skin-to-skin-contact-improve-interaction-in-very-preterm-babies-at-4-months。 aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7489d604-975c-4d2f-82a1-82a17faeecb0 Mon, 04 Dec 2023 07:56:00 -0500 Does immediate parent-infant skin-to-skin contact improve interaction in very preterm babies at 4 months?
关于家庭护理服务您需要了解什么大多数美国老年人都希望尽可能长时间地住在家里，但找到并提供他们所需的帮助通常并不容易。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231204/What-to-know-about-home-care-services.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231204/What-to-know-about-home-care-services.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=47e485ee-bdcb-4b13-95b4-4ef2811e0be6 Mon, 04 Dec 2023 07:09:37 -0500 What to know about home care services
绝望的家庭寻找负担得起的家庭护理这是一个美好的一天，退休厨师弗兰克·李可以溜到五金店，他对妻子罗宾有可靠的帮助充满信心。他几乎每天的每一个小时都在他们位于南卡罗来纳州查尔斯顿附近的障壁岛棕榈岛的家中焦急地照顾她。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231204/Desperate-families-search-for-affordable-home-care.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231204/Desperate-families-search-for-affordable-home-care.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=aeed4706-64f3-4857-938c-ca498ad3f6ab Mon, 04 Dec 2023 07:08:03 -0500 Desperate families search for affordable home care
Refeyn 推出 KaritroMP，用于快速、可重复地表征大型病毒载体质量光度测定技术的领导者 Refeyn 宣布推出其宏观质量光度测定平台 KaritroMP。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231204/Refeyn-launches-KaritroMP-for-rapid-and-reproducible-characterization-of-large-viral-vectors.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231204/Refeyn-launches-KaritroMP-for-rapid-and-reproducible-characteristic-of-large-viral-vectors.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d4ac96ed-fdf5-46d5-8baa-ddd933ec6e77 Mon, 04 Dec 2023 06:48:00 -0500 Refeyn launches KaritroMP for rapid and reproducible characterization of large viral vectors
